member.name: T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController
member.summary: Represents a Windows service and allows you to connect to a running or stopped service, manipulate it, or get information about it.

member.name: M:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that is associated with an existing service on the local computer.
member.param: The name that identifies the service to the system. This can also be the display name for the service.
member.exception: name is invalid.

member.name: M:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that is associated with an existing service on the specified computer.
member.param: The name that identifies the service to the system. This can also be the display name for the service.
The computer on which the service resides.
member.exception: name is invalid. -or- machineName is invalid.

member.name: P:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.CanPauseAndContinue
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the service can be paused and resumed.
member.returns: true if the service can be paused; otherwise, false.
member.exception: An error occurred when accessing a system API.
The service was not found.

member.name: P:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.CanShutdown
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the service should be notified when the system is shutting down.
member.returns: true if the service should be notified when the system is shutting down; otherwise, false.
member.exception: An error occurred when accessing a system API.
The service was not found.

member.name: P:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.CanStop
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the service can be stopped after it has started.
member.returns: true if the service can be stopped and the method called; otherwise, false.
member.exception: An error occurred when accessing a system API.
The service was not found.

member.name: M:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.Continue
member.summary: Continues a service after it has been paused.
member.exception: An error occurred when accessing a system API.
The service was not found.

member.name: P:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.DependentServices
member.summary: Gets the set of services that depends on the service associated with this instance.
member.returns: An array of instances, each of which is associated with a service that depends on this service.
member.exception: An error occurred when accessing a system API.
The service was not found.

member.name: P:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.DisplayName
member.summary: Gets or sets a friendly name for the service.
member.returns: The friendly name of the service, which can be used to identify the service.
member.exception: The is null.
An error occurred when accessing a system API.
The service was not found.

member.name: M:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.
member.param: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.GetDevices
member.summary: Retrieves the device driver services on the local computer.
member.returns: An array of type in which each element is associated with a device driver service on the local computer.
member.exception: An error occurred when accessing a system API.

member.name: M:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.GetDevices(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the device driver services on the specified computer.
member.param: The computer from which to retrieve the device driver services.
member.returns: An array of type in which each element is associated with a device driver service on the specified computer.
member.exception: An error occurred when accessing a system API.
The machineName parameter has invalid syntax.

member.name: M:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.GetServices(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves all the services on the specified computer, except for the device driver services.
member.param: The computer from which to retrieve the services.
member.returns: An array of type in which each element is associated with a service on the specified computer.
member.exception: An error occurred when accessing a system API.
The machineName parameter has invalid syntax.

member.name: M:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.GetServices
member.summary: Retrieves all the services on the local computer, except for the device driver services.
member.returns: An array of type in which each element is associated with a service on the local computer.
member.exception: An error occurred when accessing a system API.

member.name: P:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.MachineName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the computer on which this service resides.
member.returns: The name of the computer that is running the service associated with this instance. The default is the local computer (".").
member.exception: The syntax is invalid.

member.name: M:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.Pause
member.summary: Suspends a service's operation.
member.exception: An error occurred when accessing a system API.
The service was not found.

member.name: M:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.Refresh
member.summary: Refreshes property values by resetting the properties to their current values.

member.name: P:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.ServiceHandle
member.summary: Gets the handle for the service.
member.returns: A that contains the handle for the service.
member.exception: The service was not found.

member.name: P:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.ServiceName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name that identifies the service that this instance references.
member.returns: The name that identifies the service that this instance references. The default is an empty string ("").
member.exception: The is null.
The syntax of the property is invalid.
The service was not found.

member.name: P:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.ServicesDependedOn
member.summary: The set of services that this service depends on.
member.returns: An array of instances, each of which is associated with a service that must be running for this service to run.
member.exception: An error occurred when accessing a system API.
The service was not found.

member.name: P:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.ServiceType
member.summary: Gets the type of service that this object references.
member.returns: One of the values, used to indicate the network service type.
member.exception: An error occurred when accessing a system API.
The service was not found.

member.name: M:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.Start
member.summary: Starts the service, passing no arguments.
member.exception: An error occurred when accessing a system API.
The service was not found.

member.name: M:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.Start(System.String[])
member.summary: Starts a service, passing the specified arguments.
member.param: An array of arguments to pass to the service when it starts.
member.exception: An error occurred when accessing a system API.
The service cannot be started.
args is null. -or- A member of the array is null.

member.name: P:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.StartType
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates how the service represented by the object starts.
member.returns: A value that indicates how the service starts.
member.exception: An error occurred when accessing a system API.

member.name: P:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.Status
member.summary: Gets the status of the service that is referenced by this instance.
member.returns: One of the values that indicates whether the service is running, stopped, or paused, or whether a start, stop, pause, or continue command is pending.
member.exception: An error occurred when accessing a system API.
The service was not found.

member.name: M:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.Stop
member.summary: Stops this service and any services that are dependent on this service.
member.exception: An error occurred when accessing a system API.
The service was not found.

member.name: M:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.WaitForStatus(System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerStatus)
member.summary: Infinitely waits for the service to reach the specified status.
member.exception: The desiredStatus parameter is not any of the values defined in the enumeration.

member.name: M:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.WaitForStatus(System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerStatus,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Waits for the service to reach the specified status or for the specified time-out to expire.
member.param: A object specifying the amount of time to wait for the service to reach the specified status.
member.exception: The desiredStatus parameter is not any of the values defined in the enumeration.
The value specified for the timeout parameter expires.

member.name: T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerStatus
member.summary: Indicates the current state of the service.

member.name: F:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerStatus.ContinuePending
member.summary: The service continue is pending. This corresponds to the Win32 SERVICE_CONTINUE_PENDING constant, which is defined as 0x00000005.

member.name: F:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerStatus.Paused
member.summary: The service is paused. This corresponds to the Win32 SERVICE_PAUSED constant, which is defined as 0x00000007.

member.name: F:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerStatus.PausePending
member.summary: The service pause is pending. This corresponds to the Win32 SERVICE_PAUSE_PENDING constant, which is defined as 0x00000006.

member.name: F:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerStatus.Running
member.summary: The service is running. This corresponds to the Win32 SERVICE_RUNNING constant, which is defined as 0x00000004.

member.name: F:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerStatus.StartPending
member.summary: The service is starting. This corresponds to the Win32 SERVICE_START_PENDING constant, which is defined as 0x00000002.

member.name: F:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerStatus.Stopped
member.summary: The service is not running. This corresponds to the Win32 SERVICE_STOPPED constant, which is defined as 0x00000001.

member.name: F:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerStatus.StopPending
member.summary: The service is stopping. This corresponds to the Win32 SERVICE_STOP_PENDING constant, which is defined as 0x00000003.

member.name: T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceStartMode
member.summary: Indicates the start mode of the service.

member.name: F:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceStartMode.Automatic
member.summary: Indicates that the service is to be started (or was started) by the operating system, at system start-up. If an automatically started service depends on a manually started service, the manually started service is also started automatically at system startup.

member.name: F:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceStartMode.Boot
member.summary: Indicates that the service is a device driver started by the system loader. This value is valid only for device drivers.

member.name: F:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceStartMode.Disabled
member.summary: Indicates that the service is disabled, so that it cannot be started by a user or application.

member.name: F:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceStartMode.Manual
member.summary: Indicates that the service is started only manually, by a user (using the Service Control Manager) or by an application.

member.name: F:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceStartMode.System
member.summary: Indicates that the service is a device driver started by the IOInitSystem function. This value is valid only for device drivers.

member.name: T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceType
member.summary: Represents the type of the service.

member.name: F:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceType.Adapter
member.summary: A service for a hardware device that requires its own driver.

member.name: F:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceType.FileSystemDriver
member.summary: A file system driver, which is also a Kernel device driver.

member.name: F:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceType.InteractiveProcess
member.summary: A service that can communicate with the desktop.

member.name: F:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceType.KernelDriver
member.summary: A Kernel device driver such as a hard disk or other low-level hardware device driver.

member.name: F:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceType.RecognizerDriver
member.summary: A file system driver used during startup to determine the file systems present on the system.

member.name: F:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceType.Win32OwnProcess
member.summary: A Win32 program that can be started by the Service Controller and that obeys the service control protocol. This type of Win32 service runs in a process by itself.

member.name: F:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceType.Win32ShareProcess
member.summary: A Win32 service that can share a process with other Win32 services.

member.name: T:System.ServiceProcess.TimeoutException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown when a specified timeout has expired.

member.name: M:System.ServiceProcess.TimeoutException.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with no message text.

member.name: M:System.ServiceProcess.TimeoutException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified message text.
member.param: Text that describes the type or source of the exception.

member.name: M:System.ServiceProcess.TimeoutException.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: Initializes a new instace of the class with the specified serialization information and context.
member.param: The that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
The that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
member.exception: The info parameter is null.
The class name is null or is zero (0).

member.name: M:System.ServiceProcess.TimeoutException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified message text and inner exception.
member.param: Text that describes the type or source of the exception.
The exception that caused the current exception.
